ComicInfo.Title: Needless to Say, The Party Broke Up
ComicInfo.Summary: “Shadow War,” Milestone’s first crossover event, continues from Blood Syndicate #10. As Static prepares to endure a house party, Plus of the Shadow Cabinet, a powerful telekinetic, teleports onto the scene to recruit Static for the Shadow War. All this month’s Milestone titles have a unique Shadow War cover design. Concluded in Shadow Cabinet #0.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 06:48:33. [CVDB38524]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Paul Leon, John Paul Leon, John Paul Leon
ComicInfo.Colorist: J. Scott J., Noelle C. Giddings, Jason Scott Jones, Noelle Giddings
ComicInfo.Characters: Daisy Watkins, Dharma, Frieda Goren, Funyl, Plus, Rick Stone, Static, The Botanist
ComicInfo.Teams: Bang Babies, Shadow Cabinet, Star Chamber
